name: node-ai-boilerplate-nahid/src/agents/simpleProblemSolvingAgent.js
simpleProblemSolvingAgent
description:
Simple problem solving agent.

Defines problem based on state of the world, searches for a sequence of steps to solve it and execute said sequence of steps.

It is a open loop system - ignores precepts during execution phase. I.e, it is only good for static, discrete, observable, deterministic systems.

params.name: parameters.formulateGoal
params.description: function to formulate goal from current state

params.name: parameters.formulateProblem
params.description: function to formulate problem object from state and goal. By default it just puts state and goal into an object.

name: node-ai-boilerplate-nahid/src/common/queue.js
Queue
description:
Queues are Arrays in this codebase.

Three types of queues are available:
<li> FIFO queues
<li> LIFO queues
<li> Priority queues

name: lifoQueue
description: plain array; uses array.pop for popping

name: fifoQueue
description: plain array; uses array.shift for popping

unknown.tagValue: {object} will return an object similar to lifo/fifoQueue

name: node-ai-boilerplate-nahid/src/common/sequence.js
sequenceFirst
description: Returns first element of non-empty sequence
